entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone who has been lost and is the subject of a sack by Umbridge. He is described as being a good teacher this year.

entities.name: gryffindor common room
entities.description: The Gryffindor common room is mentioned as a place where Harry, Ron, and Hermione went to find it full of people.

entities.name: astronomy tower
entities.description: The Astronomy Tower is mentioned as the place from which Seamus and Dean heard something that they were telling everyone in the Gryffindor common room.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as someone who hates part-humans and is trying to sack Hagrid. She is also described as thinking that Hagrid was putting nifflers in her office.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who is bitter about Umbridge's actions and thinks she always wanted to sack Hagrid.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as one of the people who arrived ahead of Harry, Ron, and Hermione in the Gryffindor common room.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as someone who arrived ahead of Harry, Ron, and Hermione in the Gryffindor common room.

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: Angelina Johnson is mentioned as someone who asked why Hagrid was being sacked.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Trelawney is mentioned as someone whose teaching has been better than usual this year.

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is mentioned as someone who piped up with the information that Umbridge thought Hagrid was putting nifflers in her office.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is mentioned as someone who said 'Oh blimey' when he heard about the nifflers.

relationships.description: Umbridge is trying to sack Hagrid.
Hermione is opposed to Umbridge's actions and thinks she always wanted to sack Hagrid.
Hagrid is the target of Umbridge's sacking.
Trelawney teaches better than Hagrid this year.
